Concept

Formal description of concept, its general subclasses, related classes and properties.

a
owl:Ontology
dct:contributor
Roberta Padlina, project coordinator and software developer, University of Basel, Switzerland
dct:creator
Hans Cools, MD, knowledge engineer, ontologist, software developer, Basel University, Switzerland
dct:description
Formal description of concept, its general subclasses, related classes and properties.

dct:title
An ontology about concept
owl:versionInfo
2020-06-11
code
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Identifier belonging to a specific coding system, formed by any kind of symbols, e.g. alphanumeric.
owl:disjointWith
http://e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ document#Code
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ concept#
rdfs:subClassOf
identifier
and
skos:Concept
code system
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
System providing a code for something along certain criteria, e.g. the ISO 639 for natural languages.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ concept#

skos:ConceptScheme

has literal
a
owl:DatatypeProperty
rdfs:comment

and
hat Literale
skos:note
A reification of a literal, i.e. a symbolic entity, can always be interposed, see property chain axiom.
